Container.Name: nitter
Container.Overview:
Alternative Twitter front-end
This requires the addition of a nitter.conf file within the /mnt/user/appdata/nitter directory. Before starting the contianer for the first time run these commands within the terminal cd /mnt/user/appdata/nitter nano nitter.conf
Copy in the following; -------------------------------------------------------------------------- [Unit] Description=Nitter (An alternative Twitter front-end) After=syslog.target After=network.target
[Service] Type=simple
# set user and group User=nitter Group=nitter
# configure location WorkingDirectory=/home/nitter/nitter ExecStart=/home/nitter/nitter/nitter
Restart=always RestartSec=15
[Install] WantedBy=multi-user.target --------------------------------------------------------------------------
Save, close and run the container
